author: qiuxx
msg: when one long instance is not enough to represent the range info of the EnumSet, endElementInBits should start from least significant bit instead of most significant bit.

author: hindessm
msg: Note: Some of the tools really belong in the jre not jdk but the federation
build currently puts them in the wrong place.  We should fix this for M8.

author: johnemb
msg: DERBY-3836: On 10.4 branch JMX tests fail with security exceptions when run against classes
'Add permissions to "class" portion of the derby test policy file that were
added to the jar file section previously.'

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-498 : Provide a new property to execute a job only on the instance it was created on.
